+
The site of the main [[protest camp|encampment]], [[Frank H. Ogawa Plaza]], has been symbolically renamed "[[Oscar Grant]] Plaza" by the protestors, referring to the young African American man who was shot in the back by a white [[Bay Area Rapid Transit|BART]] police officer in 2009.<ref>{{cite web
| url=http://blog.sfgate.com/abraham/2011/10/30/occupy-oakland-the-oscar-grant-frank-ogawa-plaza-issue/
